forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 42F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
